suncertify.rmi
Class ServerUtilities

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.rmi.ServerUtilities

public final class ServerUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Server-side utility class to start and to terminate a server.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lars Kuettner

Method Detail

startServer

public static void startServer(java.lang.String databaseLocation,
                               java.lang.String port)
                        throws LaunchServerException
Creates an implementation instance of the ContractorManagerRemote interface and binds it to the name ContractorManager. Called by server to register the ContractorManager with the RMI framework.

Parameters:
databaseLocation - the location of the database file on disk
port - the port the RMI registry will listen on. System default is java.rmi.registry.Registry.REGISTRY_PORT.
Throws:
LaunchServerException - if the server can't be launched for whatever reason

terminate

public static void terminate()
Terminates the server. Called upon exiting the server application.
